answers.answer: oh i am sorry! hope you get better news on wednesday's test. it could turn around, right? ((hugs))
sorry to hear that , good luck on Wednesday test ,!
That stinks I'm sorry hun. Good luck on your next test.
I'm sorry to hear that...Just try to stay positive though because I had to do it with my last pregnancy and the three hour came back all right.  I'll keep you in my thought on Wednesday!!

Thanks everyone for your encouraging words. You ladies r the best!!! I am trying to stay positive about the three hour i am just scared because i have very bad viens and they can never find them or they collapse :( and diabetes runs in my family thou i have been safe so far.

question: My glucose test came back high now i have to go for the 3 hour test on Wensday :(
title: Just got bad news :(
